entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 04:30 AM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -3.2°C
Wind: E 34 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas in the afternoon. High zero except minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
